mapper.sql: id, persion_id, account, realname, remark, face_photo, back_photo
mapper.select: select , user_account.asset_value as capital from aliacount inner join user_account on aliacount.persion_id=user_account.user_id where persion_id = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into aliacount (id, persion_id, account, realname, remark, face_photo, back_photo) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aliAcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{facePhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

persion_id = #{persion_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
